data.name: Dream Loop
data.detailed_description:
Dream Loop is a first person exploration and puzzle experience, with an innovative music-based twist. Immerse yourself in an atmospheric dreamscape, capturing sounds from the environment to mix together to create looping tracks. What sounds mesh and what sounds clash is up to you to discover, as you create your next great album, track by track!

CENTER YOURSELF

…in a deeply emotional audio experience with immersive, meditative gameplay.

EXPLORE

…stunningly beautiful visuals and mind bending dreamscapes that mimic the experience of lucid dreaming. Breathtaking locations featuring contemporary art and architecture, high fashion and vivid landscapes.

SOLVE

…innovative “music looping” puzzles. Mix and match loops created from the sounds in the environment. Find the sounds that belong together, & be rewarded with lush, fresh original tracks, accompanied by outlandish visuals.

UNCOVER

…a tragic love story from beyond the grave – and find your inspiration in the most unlikely of places. With vintage tape recorder in hand, set out on an atmospheric adventure to create your next album, recording the sounds from your surreal environment to create each track.

TURN UP YOUR HEADPHONES

…and drop out. Completely original soundtrack and exquisitely crafted sound design create an immersive and deeply emotional audio experience.

data.short_description: The ambient indie adventure. An atmospheric first person lucid dreamscape by The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc. "...a deeply emotional audio experience, with an innovative and immersive 'music looping' puzzle system."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: manOS Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

developers: The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc
publishers: The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc
